LanguageData.GroundFreezer.label: Deep ground freezer
LanguageData.GroundFreezer.description: This device freezes the ground from inside out. The frost and snow inhibit the growth of crystals. But beware of high temperatures!
LanguageData.GroundFreezer_Blueprint.label: Deep ground freezer (blueprint)
LanguageData.GroundFreezer_Blueprint_Install.label: Deep ground freezer (blueprint)
LanguageData.GroundFreezer_Frame.label: Deep ground freezer (building)
LanguageData.GroundFreezerTribal.label: Ground freezing box
LanguageData.GroundFreezerTribal.description: This advanced version of a passive cooler is strong enough to freeze the ground. Good protection against Tiberium.
LanguageData.GroundFreezerTribal_Blueprint.label: Ground freezing box (blueprint)
LanguageData.GroundFreezerTribal_Frame.label: Ground freezing box (building)
